body:
The British Embassy in Bucharest is looking for an A2 Corporate Services Officer (CSO) to be responsible for the day to day non technical property management and support on human resource issues. 

We are looking for a highly motivated, flexible and customer-oriented individual who can on occasion cover areas the responsibilities of the position including back-up IT Support Officer for which full training will be provided. The job holder will also be the Embassy’s Learning and Development Champion.

To Apply:

All applicants should have the right to live and work in Romania. The British Embassy does not sponsor work permits.

All applicants should submit their CV (in English, up to 3 pages) and Job Application Form available on the British Embassy website https://www.gov.uk/government/world/organisations/british-embassy-bucharest/about/recruitment completing all sections and using the ‘Supporting Statement’ box to explain clearly the motivation, skills and experience you could bring to this role. 

Applications must be sent to jobapplications.ROU@fco.gov.uk and the email subject line must be formatted as follows: ROU589

The closing date for applications is 21st February 2016.

More detailed information on job specifics of this vacancy are available on the British Embassy website.
title: A2 Corporate Services Officer (CSO)
locations: Strada Jules Michelet, București, Municipiul București, România
